etymology.description: Depicts a person looking over at something or surveying the area
etymology.interpretation: The character 㕣 visually represents the action of a person looking over or surveying, capturing the essence of its meaning directly.

examples.chinese: 他㕣了菜单(他㕣了菜單)，准备点餐(準備點餐)。
examples.pinyin: Tā miǎn le càidān, zhǔnbèi diǎncān.
examples.english: He looked over the menu and prepared to order.

examples.chinese: 老师㕣考卷(老師㕣考卷)，指出错误(指出錯誤)。
examples.english: The teacher looked over the exam papers and pointed out the mistakes.
